name: Drive Passenger Rail In Desert
description:
Drive Passenger Rail In Desert is a train simulation game based on desert as well as other environments. So, get ready to drive. Run your train as fast as you can and get the passengers from station to thier destination witn in limited time.
Drive Passenger Rail In Desert game has got smooth controls. You have to complete your mission and earn coins and purchase new train and become the best train driver. Get ready to show your professional train driving skills.

Drive Passenger Rail In Desert: Features
Stunning rail sound effects.
Perfect 3D graphics and well-detailed environment
Challenging railway tracks
Smooth train control
